alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Renville; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 2:58PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Life-threatening wind chills as low as 65 below zero. * WHERE...Bottineau, Renville, and Rolette Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values will fall to extremely dangerous levels, which could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If you must be outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, dressing in layers and covering exposed skin. Ensure portable heaters are used correctly and that you have a carbon monoxide detector. Do not use generators or grills inside. If traveling, carry a winter survival kit and inform others of your travel plans. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
